posts.post_content:
Hey guys,

My condo at Ormond Bch. Fl. took some big hits from the storm, and I've still got some expenses that insurance did not pay. If you guys see anything that is listed, or even something you may be looking for, please let me know. I have a ton of stuff that is not listed, so please, feel free to ask. I also have a ton of memorabilia as well, but I'll address that in the other section in compliance with the Forum... Thanks in advance, Kevin
